name: KamakshiCloud'sIOTSolution
0:
”Alexa, turn on TV”
”Alexa, turn off TV”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You'll need Kamakshi Cloud's hardware to use this skill.


To get started:
- Enable the skill
- When redirected to login page. Enter your User Name and Password provided by Kamakshi Clouds.
- Once Account Linking Is Done, Say Alexa, discover devices. This can take up to 20 seconds. Your devices will show up in your Alexa app.
- Setup the hardware.
- Once your account is linked and Hardware is Setup, You can say "Turn on TV" and see that TV turns on
